section.title: HPE Operations Bridge Integration
section.para: This documentation demonstrates the possible integration between the &kw-hos-phrase; monitoring solution and HPE Operations Bridge.

&kw-hos; Monasca can easily be integrated with your existing monitoring tools. This page describes how to integrate &productname; Monasca with HPE Operations Bridge so that your OpenStack cloud can be monitored and managed by HPE Ops Bridge.
The COps Bridge Connector for &productname; Monasca integrates events and topology information from &productname; Monasca with the HPE Operations Bridge solution.
The integration provides the following functionality:

listitem.para: Forwarding of &productname; Monasca alerts and topology to HPE Operations Bridge for event correlation
Customization of forwarded events and topology

section.para: For more information about this connector please see BSM Connector for &productname; Monasca.
